text:
Texas A&M professor says Texas will be the "model for the nation" for the best way to open our economy. 

We use safe strategies based on data and advice from doctors. 

We open as many businesses as possible in ways that contain the spread of #COVID19.  https://t.co/9ML5CDF1uB
